The world would become more connected and interdependent as people could travel to any location in the world. This would increase global trade, cultural exchange, and collaboration.
Teleportation would revolutionize transportation and logistics, making it possible to transport goods and people instantly across the globe.
It would also change the way we live and work, as commuting times would be reduced to zero, and people could live and work anywhere in the world.
The environment would be impacted as people could travel anywhere in the world without leaving any trace, leading to an increase in carbon emissions and pollution.
